item.title: Designing On-Call
item.description: On-call is one of those things that all developers end up doing at some point. My goal isn’t to discuss the merit of on-call, but rather what the point of on-call is and how to go about designing what “on-call” means at your company. I’m going to start at the very beginning because chances are you’re already doing it wrong. I should also note that I’m looking at this specifically from a SaaS point of view.
